reviewText:
For those wanting a good price and a nice collection of the entire MCU Phase 1 without that silly suitcase thing, this is the set to get.

Box set very compact and well designed. Don't worry about the region free thing; the discs should play regardless of where you live.
I thought this may be a scam because of some other weird reviews.  But it wasn't.  My three year old was ecstatic, he actually sleeps with the box.
This box set is just what I needed, I'm sorry I didn't wrote the review before, I'm  very happy with it.
the set was great i would tell other to get itif the want great avengers movies do not miss out on some super movies
